item.title: Trump says Netflix, WBD deal could be 'problem' as son-in-law Kushner backs Paramount bid
item.description: Trump's comments came days after Netflix beat out Paramount Skydance's offer for all of WBD, and Comcast's bid for part of the company.

item.title: Former Trump lawyer Alina Habba resigns as New Jersey U.S. attorney after disqualification
item.description: Alina Habba previously served as a defense lawyer for President Donald Trump, before being tapped to become the top federal prosecutor in New Jersey.

item.title: Trump announces $12 billion aid package for farmers caught up in trade war
item.description: President Donald Trump has imposed shifting tariff policies on most countries, while pushing to reshape relationships with China and other major trade...

item.title: Supreme Court conservatives poised to back Trump in FTC firing case
item.description: The justices heard arguments in the DOJ's appeal of a lower court's decision that Trump exceeded his authority when he moved to dismiss FTC member Reb...

item.title: Trump says Zelenskyy 'hasn't read U.S. peace proposal' as tensions mount
item.description: Tensions appear to be mounting once again between U.S. President Donald Trump and President Volodymyr Zelenskyy.
